verb.description: Use a spiralizer to cut (vegetables) into long ribbons or strips.
examples: you don't need to buy gluten-free spaghetti if you spiralize zucchini
a simple salad of spiralized carrots, tangy feta cheese, sweet raisins, and crunchy chickpeas

origin: Mid 19th century (in the sense move in a spiral or cut spirally): from spiral + -ize.
